abilities.name: Ancient Shell
abilities.effect: As long as you have Omanyte or Omastar in play, damage done to Kabutops by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Energy Stream
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Kabutops.

attacks.name: Extra Claws
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.
